title: The Australian littering quest
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Refuse and refuse disposal
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Pollution - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Refuse and refuse disposal
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection - Citizen participation
description: A satirical look at the four contestants hopeful of winning Australia's littering quest. Describes the various ways they do their littering - including leaving rubbish at a picnic, throwing out "throw-away litter bags". The judge, a computer, comments on their achievements and announces the winner. Cast includes Tom Paine, Pauline David, Rod Bryer, Guy Doro-Sainter, Monika Tokarski, Ema Ganet.
